title: The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle – 36 Count Tea Bags Each
descriptions:
**The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle – 36 Count Tea Bags Each**

Bring the warmth and flavors of the harvest season into your home with our Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle, featuring Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Teas. Each tea is carefully crafted to capture the essence of fall, with a blend of natural ingredients that evoke the scents and tastes of the season.

**Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea**

Indulge in the warm, spiced flavors of our Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea, a naturally-caffeine-free blend that combines the sweetness of apples with the comforting spices of cinnamon, cloves, and ginger. This soothing tea is perfect for sipping on a crisp autumn evening, accompanied by the sound of leaves crunching underfoot.

Ingredients: Apple pieces, Cinnamon, Orange peel, Rose hips, Berry leaves, Natural flavors, Ginger root, Cloves, Citric acid, Cardamom seeds

**Caramel Apple Herbal Tea**

Savor the sweet, velvety flavors of our Caramel Apple Herbal Tea, a caffeine-free blend that pairs the juicy taste of apples with the rich, creamy sweetness of caramel and vanilla. This decadent tea is a delightful way to cap off a long day, especially when paired with a warm, flaky pastry or a crunchy apple crisp.

Ingredients: Rooibos, Apple bits, Natural apple and caramel flavors, Vanilla extract

**Steeping Instructions**

To bring out the full flavor and aroma of our teas, we recommend the following steeping instructions:

* Water temperature: Rolling boil
* Amount of water: 6 oz
* Steep time: 5-7 minutes
* Additional tip: Used tea bags can be added to compost or soil to reduce waste and nourish your garden.

**Bundle Details**

This Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle includes two 36-count boxes of tea bags, one for each flavor. Perfect for sipping on its own or sharing with friends and family, this bundle makes a thoughtful gift for anyone who loves the flavors of fall.

**Product Features**

* Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle
* Two 36-count boxes of tea bags (Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Teas)
* Naturally-caffeine-free and caffeine-free blends
* Made with high-quality, natural ingredients
* Perfect for sipping on a crisp autumn evening or as a dessert tea
* Great for sharing with friends and family, or as a thoughtful gift

**Order now and experience the warmth and comfort of our Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle!**
